TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 提供一种在整个服务内修改或插入自定义扩展的机制，包括 。

span.span: Provides a mechanism to modify or insert custom extensions across an entire service, including the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 可以在应用程序级别，修改、检查或扩展服务范围的某些执行方面：Implement to modify, examine, or extend some aspect of service-wide execution at the application level: - 使用 方法可以更改运行时属性值或插入自定义扩展对象，例如错误处理程序、消息或参数拦截器、安全扩展以及其他自定义扩展对象。Use the method to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter interceptors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects. - 使用 方法可以在 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 构造执行服务前检查说明，从而确认该执行服务是否可正确执行。Use the method to examine the description before [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] constructs the executing service to confirm that it can execute properly. - 使用 方法可以向绑定元素传递服务的自定义信息，这样绑定元素就可向服务提供正确的支持。Use the method to pass to a binding element the custom information for the service so that it can support the service correctly. 对象可使用所有这些方法，但通常只有一种方法是重要的，在这种情况下，未被使用的方法可不带值返回。 objects can make use of any of these methods, but often only one is important; in such cases the unused methods can return without a value. > [!NOTE] > 所有 方法会将 和 对象作为参数传递。All of the methods pass and objects as a parameters. 参数只用于检查；如果您修改了这些对象，则执行行为将不确定。The parameter is for examination only; if you modify these objects the execution behavior is undefined. 若要执行 对象的自定义任务，则必须在构造服务运行时前，将该对象添加到 属性。To perform the customization task for which it is intended, the object must be added to the property prior to the construction of the service runtime. 有三种方法可以实现此操作：There are three ways to do this: - 以编程方式，先将自定义服务行为添加到 属性，然后对 对象调用 方法。Programmatically add the custom service behavior to the property prior to the point where the method is called on the object. - 创建一个可实现 的自定义属性，并利用它来标记要修改的服务类。Create a custom attribute that implements and use it to mark service classes that are to be modified. 当构造对象时，WCF 使用反射来发现服务类型上的属性。When a object is constructed, WCF uses reflection to discover the attributes on the service type. 如果有属性实现 ，则它们将会被添加到 上的行为集合中。If any attributes implement , they are added to the behaviors collection on . - 扩展 类，以支持应用程序配置文件或计算机配置文件中的行为规范。Extend the class to support the specification of the behavior in an application or machine configuration file. 有关更多信息，请参见“示例”一节。See the Example section for more information. 在 WCF 中的服务行为的示例包括属性， 、和行为。Examples of service behaviors in WCF include the attribute, the , the and the behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用配置文件中所指定的服务行为来向服务应用程序中插入自定义错误处理程序。The following code example shows the use of a service behavior specified in a configuration file to insert a custom error handler in a service application. 在该示例中，错误处理程序捕获所有异常，并将它们转换为一个自定义 `GreetingFault` SOAP 错误，该自定义错误会随后返回给客户端。In this example, the error handler catches all exceptions and converts them into a custom `GreetingFault` SOAP fault that is then returned to the client. 下面的 实现不添加任何绑定参数对象，而会将自定义 对象添加到所有 属性，并会验证服务行为所应用到的、 类型为 `GreetingFault` 的服务的每个操作。The following implementation adds no binding parameter objects, adds the custom object to each property, and validates that each operation of the service to which the service behavior is applied and has a of type `GreetingFault`. [!code-csharp[IErrorHandler#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/ierrorhandler.cs#7)] [!code-vb[IErrorHandler#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/vb/ierrorhandler.vb#7)] 在该示例中，行为类还可实现 ，这样就可通过在应用程序配置文件中使用服务行为来插入服务行为，具体请参见下面的代码示例。In this example, the behavior class also implements , which enables the service behavior to be inserted by using it in an application configuration file, as the following code example demonstrates. [!code-xml[IErrorHandler#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddBindingParameters (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase, System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> endpoints, System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection bindingParameters);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddBindingParameters(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase, class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> endpoints, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection bindingParameters) cil managed

public: void AddBindingParameters(System::ServiceModel::Description::ServiceDescription ^ serviceDescription, System::ServiceModel::ServiceHostBase ^ serviceHostBase, System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<System::ServiceModel::Description::ServiceEndpoint ^> ^ endpoints, System::ServiceModel::Channels::BindingParameterCollection ^ bindingParameters);

span.span: The service description of the service.

param.name: bindingParameters
param.span: 绑定元素可访问的自定义对象。

span.span: Custom objects to which binding elements have access.

summary.span: 用于向绑定元素传递自定义数据，以支持协定实现。

span.span: Provides the ability to pass custom data to binding elements to support the contract implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以将自定义对象添加到 `parameters` 集合，绑定元素可利用该集合获取额外信息，从而向协定提供支持。Use the method to add custom data objects to the `parameters` collection that binding elements can use to acquire extra information to enable them to support the contract. 对每个侦听 URI 都调用一次该方法。This method is called once for each listen URI. 例如，如果一个服务有四个终结点，其中两个终结点的侦听 URI 相同，则此方法将会被调用三次。For example, if a service has four endpoints, and two of them have the same listen URI, then this method gets called three times. 原因是，`bindingParameters` 要定位所有通道堆栈，每个侦听 URI 都有一个通道堆栈。The reason is that the `bindingParameters` target each channel stack and there is one channel stack for each listen URI. 因为每个调用都要在侦听 URI 接收这些终结点，所以有两个调用将会各自获得一个单独的 ，另一个调用将会获得两个 对象的集合。Because each call receives those endpoints at that listen URI, two calls each get a single , and one call gets a collection of two objects. > [!NOTE] > 所有 方法会将 和 对象作为参数传递。All of the methods pass and objects as a parameters. 参数仅用于自定义检查和插入；如果您修改了这些对象，则执行行为将不确定。The parameter is for examination and insertion of customizations only; if you otherwise modify these objects the execution behavior is undefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ApplyDispatchBehavior (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyDispatchBehavior(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase) cil managed

span.span: The host that is currently being built.

summary.span: 用于更改运行时属性值或插入自定义扩展对象（例如错误处理程序、消息或参数拦截器、安全扩展以及其他自定义扩展对象）。

span.span: Provides the ability to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter interceptors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法可以检查或修改正在构建的 对象，从而支持某些自定义执行方案。Implement the method to inspect or modify the object that is being constructed in order to support some custom execution scenario. > [!NOTE] > 所有 方法会将 和 对象作为参数传递。All of the methods pass and objects as a parameters. 参数仅用于自定义检查和插入；如果您修改了这些对象，则执行行为将不确定。The parameter is for examination and insertion of customizations only; if you otherwise modify these objects the execution behavior is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用配置文件中所指定的服务行为来向服务应用程序中插入自定义错误处理程序。The following code example shows the use of a service behavior specified in a configuration file to insert a custom error handler in a service application. 在该示例中，错误处理程序捕获所有异常，并将它们转换为一个自定义 `GreetingFault` SOAP 错误，该自定义错误会随后返回给客户端。In this example, the error handler catches all exceptions and converts them into a custom `GreetingFault` SOAP fault that is then returned to the client. 下面的 实现不添加任何绑定参数对象，而会将自定义 对象添加到所有 属性，并会验证服务行为所应用到的、 类型为 `GreetingFault` 的服务的每个操作。The following implementation adds no binding parameter objects, adds the custom object to each property, and validates that each operation of the service to which the service behavior is applied and has a of type `GreetingFault`. [!code-csharp[IErrorHandler#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/ierrorhandler.cs#7)] [!code-vb[IErrorHandler#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/vb/ierrorhandler.vb#7)] 在该示例中，行为类还可实现 ，这样就可通过在应用程序配置文件中使用服务行为来插入服务行为，具体请参见下面的代码示例。In this example, the behavior class also implements , which enables the service behavior to be inserted by using it in an application configuration file, as the following code example demonstrates. [!code-xml[IErrorHandler#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Validate (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Validate(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase serviceHostBase) cil managed

param.name: serviceHostBase
param.span: 当前正在构建的服务主机。

span.span: The service host that is currently being constructed.

summary.span: 用于检查服务主机和服务说明，从而确定服务是否可成功运行。

span.span: Provides the ability to inspect the service host and the service description to confirm that the service can run successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法以确定当前服务是否会依照方案正确执行。Use the method to confirm whether the current service can execute properly according to your scenario. > [!NOTE] > 所有 方法会将 和 对象作为参数传递。All of the methods pass and objects as a parameters. 参数仅用于自定义检查和插入；如果您修改了这些对象，则执行行为将不确定。The parameter is for examination and insertion of customizations only; if you otherwise modify these objects the execution behavior is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用配置文件中所指定的服务行为来向服务应用程序中插入自定义错误处理程序。The following code example shows the use of a service behavior specified in a configuration file to insert a custom error handler in a service application. 在该示例中，错误处理程序捕获所有异常，并将它们转换为一个自定义 `GreetingFault` SOAP 错误，该自定义错误会随后返回给客户端。In this example, the error handler catches all exceptions and converts them into a custom `GreetingFault` SOAP fault that is then returned to the client. 下面的 实现不添加任何绑定参数对象，而会将自定义 对象添加到所有 属性，并会验证服务行为所应用到的、 类型为 `GreetingFault` 的服务的每个操作。The following implementation adds no binding parameter objects, adds the custom object to each property, and validates that each operation of the service to which the service behavior is applied and has a of type `GreetingFault`. [!code-csharp[IErrorHandler#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/ierrorhandler.cs#7)] [!code-vb[IErrorHandler#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/vb/ierrorhandler.vb#7)] 在该示例中，行为类还可实现 ，这样就可通过在应用程序配置文件中使用服务行为来插入服务行为，具体请参见下面的代码示例。In this example, the behavior class also implements , which enables the service behavior to be inserted by using it in an application configuration file, as the following code example demonstrates. [!code-xml[IErrorHandler#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/ierrorhandler/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#4)]
